job.title: Software Engineer, Frontend
job.description: were looking for talented engineers who are passionate about changing the way people learn languages as a cambly engineer youll be part of a small and fastmoving engineering team where youll have a large impact on all parts of the cambly platform weve been growing rapidly among language learners around the world so youll get to learn what its like to join a fast growing startup thats creating opportunities for our students and tutors alikeltbrgtltbrgtas an frontendfocused software engineer youll be responsible building an amazing classroom experience the majority of our tutoring time happens in our webbased lesson interface so youll be responsible for making sure our students have the ideal classroom for improving their english youll also be responsible for building the frontend infrastructure that will enable our growing team to build and ship new features quicklyltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtrequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligta productminded approach to engineering you should be excited about working directly with our students tutors and our international team to make sure students have an amazing experienceltligtltligt years experience building and shipping modern frontend software quickly as part of a teamltligtltligt years working with reactjs redux html css esltligtltligta passion for learning you fearlessly dive into new and unfamiliar technologiesltligtltligta global perspective you should be excited about building an app in languages that integrates with the social networks and payment methods used by our studentsltligtltligta bachelors degree in computer science or equivalentltbrgtltligtltulgton a small and nimble team every engineer should be able to learn new technologies quickly and jump in anywhere in our stack while this position is specifically for frontend you should have experience using or be excited about learning all the parts of cambly including ios android and python
